title: (x) Sporish - ITC Eras {Karl}
content:
This is a part of a logo I have to re-create. The typeface looks awfully familiar, but I can't get the name in my head. It's propably also slanted artificially (?)   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516143347im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/35163.gif)
author: jsandvik

comments.content:
And dont forget bitmapped.   
Just how I like it.   
 ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516143347im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
�SPORISH� is sort of an onomatopoeic description of what happened to poor Eras in this logo. Oy!
